When I saw that Softwarekeep had an average rating of 4.9 on Trustpilot, I thought that I could trust the company. However, I should have taken the time to look at the negative reviews. I discovered that the process of purchasing software can be a bit confusing. I initially received an email stating that the purchase failed to pass the “automated verification” process and that I needed to provide a “screenshot of the transaction with the visible merchant name, date and the amount.” The request seemed awful suspicious to me, so I ignored the email thinking that it was a phishing scam. However, it was a legitimate email and by ignoring the request my purchase was cancelled. But, the next day I received an email stating that the order was approved and that I would be receiving an “instructional email on how to download and install your software.” I never received the instructional email and the very next day I received an email from PayPal notifying me that the amount of the purchase had been refunded. Therefore, I found that the entire process of attempting to try to purchase 2019 Microsoft Office was very confusing. Rather than trying to save money by going through a third party vendor, I should have purchased the software directly from Microsoft.

Review.Titre: Took my payment and then told me the product I paid for did not exist on the site
Review.Contenu: I am dissatisfied with this business. It had a buy button next to the software app I wanted to purchase, and then automatically added a suggested purchase presumably to make the app I wanted work better. I added the upgrade of the other app and clicked the buy button, put in payment information and the website immediately received my charge. Then when I attempted the download, I got "Houston, we have a problem, the page you are looking for does not EXIST." Why does your site take my money for something you don't even have?I was able to contact customer service by chat, but I received a message from PayPal about my payment less than 30 seconds after I submitted payment, and the rep said we have to wait 15 minutes because he couldn't see the transaction (I couldn't give him the order number because the dialog box with the message that the page does not exist obscured the number). I told him I just wanted a refund, and I was waiting, but then he left the chat and I had to go into the chat box to get him back on the line after waiting at least 20 minutes. The rep did process a refund, but I have to wait 24-48 hours for that refund to process. How does it take over 24 hours to process a refund when it takes less than 30 seconds to process my payment. I won't try to purchase anything from this site again. I'm just praying I actually do get my refund.

He was polite throughout the entirety of our conversation.  Initially, over the phone he said he would email me another key, but the key was not in his email.  I had to call back and talk with him again at which point he accessed my computer using Zoho and helped directly.  Only then did I receive a new key.  He initially installed a version that didn't work on my computer, which took over 30 minutes.  He then had to install a different version, which took another half hour.  Throughout the time he was assisting me, there would be times I would ask questions in the chat and it would take at lest 5 minutes for him to respond.  It was also somewhat frustrating that he relentlessly kept asking me to complete the review before he finished helping me- even after I told him more than once that I would complete the review after everything was completely installed.  Overall, very terrible experience.  I will not use Softwarekeep in the future and will not recommend it to anyone I know.  Joe was polite and eventually got the job done, but it took much longer than it should have.

Review.Titre: WHEN I TRY TO ACTIVATE  OFFICE MAC  …
Review.Contenu: WHEN I TRY TO ACTIVATE  OFFICE MAC 2011, THE MESSAGE IS "PRODUCT KEY NUMBER NOT VALID".PHONE CALLS TO THE POSTED TELEPHONE NUMBER RING 50 TIMES WITH NO ANSWER.EMAILS TO THE LISTED EMAIL ADDRESS ARE NOT ANSWERED.THUS1- PRODUCT, TO DATE, DOES NOT WORK2- CONSUMER SUPPORT DOES NOT APPEAR TO EXIST----------------------------------------------------------------------AFTER POSTING THIS REVIEW THREE DAYS AGO, I CALLED MICROSOFT.THE MS TECH ASSISTANT FINALLY DETERMINED THAT THE DISK THAT I HAD ENTERED (LABELLED OFFICE MAC 2011) WAS, IN REALITY, A PC DISK.HAVING BEEN UNABLE TO CONTACT SOFTWAREKEEP, I GAVE UP THE GHOST AND JUST BOUGHT AN OFFICE MAC PROGRAM DIRECTLY FROM MICROSOFT.ON DAY 4,  I FINALLY GOT AN EMAIL REPLY FROM SOFTWAREKEEP, IN FACT I GOT 2.IN MY REPLY I EXPLAINED THE ABOVE, TOLD THEM THAT THEY WERE TOO LATE, AND JUST ASKED FOR A REFUND.SUBSEQUENTLY, I RECEIVED A REPLY FROM "MS X" (PRESUMABLY A SOFTWAREKEEP REPRESENTATIVE) TELLING ME "AS THE BUYER, IT IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY TO KNOW YOUR SYSTEM AND COMPATIBILITY REQUIREMENTS OF THE PRODUCT BEFORE MAKING A PURCHASE." (MIND YOU, I HAVE A MAC, ORDERED A MAC PRODUCT, RECEIVED A DISC THAT WAS LABELLED OFFICE MAC 2011, BUT WHICH WAS, IN FACT, A PC DISK). "IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS PRIOR TO MAKING YOUR PURCHASE, PLEASE TAKE ADVANTAGE OF OUR LIVE CHAT OR TALK IT THROUGH WITH OUR CUSTOMER CARE TEAM""ONCE WE ISSUE YOU A MICROSOFT PRODUCT KEY ... THE SALE IS CONSIDERED FINAL ONCE YOU HAVE USED IT OR TRIED IT AND WE CANNOT ACCEPT REFUND REQUESTS. WE CANNOT ISSUE REFUNDS ONCE PRODUCT KEYS HAVE BEEN DISTRIBUTED".-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------BOTTOM LINE1- I BOUGHT IT2- THE INSTALLATION FAILED3- SOFTWAREKEEP WAS NOT AVAILABLE TO ME BY PHONE OR EMAIL4- I BOUGHT A REPLACEMENT PRODUCT DIRECTLY FROM MICROSOFT5- SOFTWAREKEEP REFUSED TO REFUND, CLAIMING THAT THE ERROR WAS MINE-----------------------------------------------------------------OUT OF CURIOSITY, I THEN WENT TO THE SOFTWAREKEEP WEB SITE AND READ THEIR TERMS AND CONDITIONS.IT WAS INTERESTING READING.AT THE END, I FOUND THAT THEY ARE BOUND BY THE GOVERNING LAW OF (THEIR OWN LISTED ADDRESS) IN ROBERTS POINT WASHINGTON (ROBERTS POINT IS A LAND ENCLAVE ON THE US/CANADA BORDER)ON GOOGLE EARTH, (THE CORPORATE ADDRESS SHOWN IN THEIR WEB SITE) "APPEARS TO BE" A RESIDENTIAL LOCATION.NOTE: I HAVE NO KNOWLEDGE OF WASHINGTON STATE LAW.I ALSO REVIEWED (ON THEIR WEBSITE) "WHO WE ARE" ... AN INTERESTING COLLECTION OF SKETCH DRAWINGS AND PERSONAL PROFILES.I LEAVE IT TO YOU TO DRAW YOUR OWN CONCLUSIONS.I AM OUT THE MONEY.I KNOW THAT.BUT I FEEL BETTER AFTER POSTING THIS UPDATE------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------FURTHER INVESTIGATION REVEALS THAT (THE WASHINGTON ADDRESS) IS THE ADDRESS OF "POINT TO POINT" ... A PARCEL SERVICE THAT IS THREE BLOCKS FROM U.S. CUSTOMS. "POINT TO POINT'S" WEBSITE INCLUDES PICTURES OF THEIR FACILITY WHICH DO NOT APPEAR TO SHOW ANY EXISTING OFFICE SPACE THAT MIGHT BE RENTED. THEIR RATE STRUCTURE DOES NOT APPEAR TO INCLUDE ANY SPACE RENTAL OPTIONS.ON A SIMILAR NOTE, SOFTWAREKEEP.canada IS LOCATED AT (AN ADDRESS TO BE FOUND IN THEIR WEB SITE REGARDING THEIR CANADIAN OPERATION) ... THIS APPEARS TO BE A "SERVICED APARTMENT" USED BY SEVERAL CLIENTSTHE (CANADIAN WEB SITE) ADDRESS AND THE POINT ROBERTS SITE ARE 20 MILES APART.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I AM ADVISED BY THE POINT ROBERTS CHAMBER OF COMMERCE THAT SOFTWAREKEEP.usa IS NOT LOCATED AT (THE WASHINGTON SITE REFERENCED IN THE WEB SITE). THEY (THE CHAMBER) OFFERED NO ADDITIONAL DETAILS.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------THE CURRENT SOFTWAREKEEP.ca WEBSITE SHOWS AN ADDRESS THAT IS DIFFERENT FROM THE ADDRESS REFERENCED IN THEIR CANADIAN WEB SITE AS BEING THEIR "GOVERNING LAW" SITE.THEIR "ADDRESS" IS  A UPS LOCATION.THE VANCOUVER BBB SHOWS A THIRD VANCOUVER AS THE MAILING ADDRESS FOR SOFTWAREKEEP, AND LISTS A BUSINESS INCEPTION DATE OF 2-12-2014NOTE: THIS REVIEW HAS BEEN EDITED SO AS TO REMOVE EMAIL ADDRESSES, AND SPECIFIC LOCATIONS. Review.Titre: Mixed review, the good AND bad!
Review.Contenu: Their customer chat support is 5 stars. They started processing my order quickly. Their listed pricing is reasonable. Beyond that I give them zero stars.  I first tried a 20% coupon code their Tech Talk "commercial" Youtube video recommended but that was invalid. Then when I set up my account their website offered me a 12% coupon code in a pop-up, so I used that. My invoice was processed, a person assigned to my purchase, and information on my Microsoft Account provided via email as they requested. I received confirmation that my order would be processed within 2 business days. I was already on a tight timeline to complete the installation on 5 PC's. Then I received an email from a different person saying they would not honor the 12% discount because in the fine print Office 365 products were excluded. I didn't see any of that during my purchase. Why would it allow me to complete the purchase if it was not valid? They told me that I would need to complete a second purchase and not use the coupon code this time. After already processing my invoice and work being started. I asked them to cancel my purchase and went direct through Microsoft instead. They did process a refund invoice immediately. I wasted 2 days on this, checking their reviews, shopping for the right product, asking questions, and going through their order steps. Disappointing in the end.

Unfortunately, I am having a most difficult time! I was told that MS Office for Mac 2011 had been activated! However, I continue to have a pop up during my online meeting stating that my software has NOT been activated! This must be corrected TODAY, since I will videoconference tomorrow, and I don't want this pop up to happen again!!Please advise by phone call or chat!Dr. David Watkins

After a painful and persistent several days back and forth with customer service, they finally addressed my concerns. To their credit, they went above and beyond with a free software upgrade in the final solution, but the original problem and their initial reaction to it makes me wary.

Review.Titre: Beware. Difficult to reach and product used up.
Review.Contenu: I was sold  MS Office Professional. I was unable to activate it because it had been activated too many times. I tried for 4 days to resolve the issue but kept getting the same message from them: to try a difdferent way of activating it. I asked for a refund several times. Finally, I called my bank and asked them to file a dispute. They will refund my money, because the company refused  to send me software that works, or a refund.

Review.Titre: The software came with an expired …
Review.Contenu: The software came with an expired product key. I called your help and a fellow remotely accessed my machine and "fixed" it. It allowed execution of the software. The next day i got the message to activate again. I can cancel the message and the software will work.  Every time I launch Word or Excel I have to go through canceling the activation procedure.  If follow through the activation prompt it fails. There were no bad action or words between me and the tech. I thought he had fixed it.

Bought MS Office for Mac via their UK site. Good price but supplied key wasn't valid in UK though! Had to call Microsoft to sort out. Fortunately they did within 20 minutes but still unnecessary hassle. I'd avoid in future and go direct to developers website.

Review.Titre: Terrible download experience, great tech support.
Review.Contenu: I was a bit skeptical about buying a MS Home and Student 2019 from this site. I did get a invoice confirmation and about 20 mins later I received an email with the product key and a download link. The link sent me to a web page that stated the download was 'limited due to high traffic', and if I wanted to continue I should upgrade to premium ($48+ to upgrade). Talked to tech support ('Joe') and said I had the 'offline' link provided in the initial email (Not sure why)... Joe then suggested i download from MS.com. Which worked and i was able to install MS. 2 star for the terrible download experience, 5 star for the tech support.

Awful company. Sold me some antivirus product with keys that were apparently already in use in a different country. They seem disingenuous. I'm trying to get them to refund my money. Stay far away from these people!They did finally refund my money. I still wouldn't trust these people.. I've read some other reviews where the people have contacted the support for MS and Microsoft actually told them the keys that Softwarekeep sold them were pirated. So I'm not saying this for sure, just from what I've read it seems likely. Glad that they did finally step up and refund my money though.

very disappointing.  I purchased a product with a single installation in September.  Worked fine, but then had my laptop worked on and the OS upgraded.  After that, the product would not open without a confirmation with the original key, except that it wouldn't accept the key because it had already been used once.  Requested help and advise but was told the warranty had expired (a few days prior) and so another key could not be issued.  I tried to save money by purchasing a one time download, not a good idea and I won't do it again. The company is within their rights on this, but I will pay the extra money for a hard copy (disc) from now on.

Review.Titre: No product keys to sell but take your money.
Review.Contenu: No product keys to sell however they still took my money. To add insult to injury they offered me a mediocre virus software as a replacement to what I had orginallay purchased.  They were unwilling to negotiate a decent anti virus software I was willing to pay more. The loser is the custmoer and the winner is Softwarekeep, as now they have my money and it takes 4-5 day for refund.A note to Softwarekeep if you are selling products ensure you have the supplies before taking customers money and also remove the product from your website its not that hard. All those customers ordering items that you do not have the product keys for but you have there money. Not a bad way to build some interest in the bank account. Bad buisness practice.

Review.Titre: Talked or chatted with at least three …
Review.Contenu: Talked or chatted with at least three representatives that I could not download Microsoft Office. Finally they sent a link that I could actually use.  Will never recommend your software.

I am currently going through the refund process with Software Keep.Basically I ordered Word 2016 for £69. Went through checkout and 30 minutes later I was still yet to receive my download link. So ...I contacted them via chat, and the clerk tells me they have run out of 'Keys' for Word but...they are willing to offer me an upgrade. 'Great' I thought an upgrade sounds good! But ...what they were offering was a version of Office 365 priced at £47. When I asked if they would refund the differance they said no they could'nt do that. To me, this did'nt make any sense! No matter what I said they still could not explain why this was the case. So I asked for a refund seeing as they acted like they did'nt care and were slow to apologize. So...was this the end of my ordeal? Nope. Of course not. I'm now going back and forth asking for a refund. Although they say a full refund will be granted they still can't send me a confirmation email stating this for some reason. Apparently it's in the hands of their auto service or some rubbish. Absolutely crazy. The chat system on their website is also useless, the clerk just ignorned me for minutes at a time (Likely off on a tea break in between questions).So, above all the whole expereince for me has been a complete waste of my time. Thanks Software Keep for inspiring me to shop elsewhere in the future!

Won't go into details but I appreciate Bryan for taking over the situation personally and making the effort to reach out to me.

Review.Titre: Carl was really good but when I buy…
Review.Contenu: Carl was really good but when I buy online software for download, I've kinda got used to it just downloading instantly and installing with a few simple clicks. Glad that Carl really knew what he was doing and could do a telephone activation of the software. To be fair, I have multiple machines on the same account and maybe Microsoft don't like that. Thanks a lot Carl. You were quick, knowledgeable and got the job done.

We purchased a copy of Microsoft Office 2019 and when we went to redeem it, the code claimed it was already used. We went straight to customer service and were helped by a representative by the name of Ping. Within 5 minutes and a screenshot for understanding they were able to replace our product and we got what we paid for with no further problems. 2/5 system, 5/5 customer support. Thank you Ping!

Review.Titre: I had problems installing the software…
Review.Contenu: I had problems installing the software for Microsoft Office.  Chat was trying to help the first time and I got really busy and couldn't deal with it.  The next time I started the chat I got  Ela she was a very helpful person and she stuck with me until we could get it installed.  I'm not sure why I had so much trouble with the activation.  But I have to say she would not give up and got the job done for me.

Review.Titre: Keys invalidated if not installed quickly? Fishy.
Review.Contenu: I placed two orders for Office 2013 Professional Plus, but waited a month to install them on two PCs. Both keys were deemed invalid by Microsoft. SoftwareKeep tech chat was efficient at diagnosing the issue and providing me with fresh keys that activated just fine, but I'm left with this nagging feeling that the keys aren't completely legit—if I'd bought retail sealed-box keys, I would have been guaranteed they were unique to me and would not lose validity in a few weeks.

After spending more than a couple hours last night the software never fully installed. I should have just stuck with the normal purchase through a trusted site. It shows the software is there but it gives errors everytime I open PowerPoint, word, etc., and states its unregistered. What a waste of time and money.

Purchased product online and did not receive email key within what I would have considered a timely manner. Phone not answered during normal business hours nor email replied to.  Finally received product key. Please explain how your process works online and normal delays which may be encountered in receiving product. "product key" sent implies an imminent delivery !

"Fabian was helpful in logging in and remotely activating my product for me" then forced me to write this review and submitted this himself. Since then this is my update. Where I did receive the product that I requested, I do not appreciate the way it had to be done.

The company needs to provide hours of operation in the message that is reached when attempting to contact Technical Support. As it is now, all the recording does is say that "NO-ONE is available to help at this time". If I had known that contacting during the hours of 8a to 5p PACIFIC time would have put me in contact with a technician days earlier. Jason the technician was able to identify and remedy the issue but in order to connect with him took several frustrating attempts.

Review.Titre: After a fair amount of hassle (and a poor review), they made good on the sale to me.
Review.Contenu: According to Microsoft support the software they sold me is pirated OEM software and the product key is blocked by Microsoft. I am still waiting for SotwareKeep to provide a legitimate regular licensed product key or refund my money.Update: After waiting several hours I placed the above review. Shortly after, a support supervisor, Anne, personally called me, emailed me a new activation code, and stayed on the phone until I got it installed and verified some of the applications included in the product was activated.

For some reason, after four months use with no issues, my copy of Win7 Pro was flagged by Windows/Microsoft as possible counterfeit.  I was unable to fully resolve the issue with SoftwareKeep to my own satisfaction.  They believe the cause was related to the installation.In the end, after many support chats, emails and calls, I was provided a refund outside of the normal refund/return window.Not 100% happy I'm having the authentication issue which will likely result in a complete clean install, but SoftwareKeep did make a real effort at an equitable solution.

Review.Titre: I am only giving this company 3 stars
Review.Contenu: I am only giving this company 3 stars, because I had difficulty getting the product downloaded, as the download button did not work.  The first person that I had helping me on chat, was not at all helpful.  I was angry and frustrated.  He was unable to help me, and eventually guided me to the Mcafee free trial download page.  I ended up installing a free one month trial.  I did not get what I had ordered. Thankfully, a second person that I spoke to, David, helped me.  He figured out the convoluted situation, and quickly and efficiently, solved my problem.  I give him 5 stars.  He is an asset to this company.  He saved my day!

I will update this if possible after my issue is hopefully resolved.  I just ordered a digital download of MS Publisher 2016.  After waiting about 40 minutes after receiving my initial email that stated my digital purchase was on its way I used the "chat" option at the bottom of the screen to see if I could see what was taking so long.  A guy named Don was very nice and quickly responded.  However the answer given was that they temporarily ran out of codes and I will receive one immediately upon them getting more.  They were expecting this to be in the next 3-4 hours.  I'm hoping that is the case, time will tell......

Review.Titre: Product key would not associate with the software
Review.Contenu: In August 2021, we purchased Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB 2016 65 bit. Sofrwarekeep had the best price we could find on the web. We downloaded the product and successfully installed it but but the provided product key would not associate with program we tried to register. After considerable on and off communications, repeated clean installations and online troubleshooting with the company representatives, SofwareKeep provided me with a different product key. This too would not  associate with the program. SofwareKeep then refunded me the purchase price. Overall, I lost considerable time during the repeated installations and troubleshooting and was delayed in my work. We turned to a different vendor, trustedtechteam.com Their product was marginally more expensive but it installed cleanly and the correct product key became associated with the version I installed

I was hoping to get it within that time limit and did receive an email with my invoice within 30 minutes but the email stated that the link would come separately. I waited slightly over an hour from the time I received the email before I contacted the website through live chat. I was helped by Carl who quickly sent over the link within a few minutes. I just wish they wouldn't boast about getting the link within 30 minutes and even display a timer unless they are completely sure it is possible to send in that time frame. Other than that everything went smoothly just disappointed about the amount of time it took to receive the link.

In a nutshell:- I went to their website and selected Microsoft Office for Windows and Mac (download).- I went through the checkout process and then hit submit.- I received an email about 15 minutes later saying that they were 'verifying' my purchase and it should only take another 15 minutes.- A half-hour later, I contacted them via chat to find out the status of my order.  The person on the other end asked what kind of computer I had, and I told them a Mac.  They then told me that I had ordered the Windows version and gave me a link to the Mac version.-  They then cancelled my order and started to process a refund.-  I went back to the shopping cart and the version in the shopping cart said "for windows and mac".-  I sent an email to "Chase", who I guess is the owner or manager or customer service dude, with a screenshot of what I ordered and an explanation of what had happened. - 24-hours later..... no response.- I clicked on the link sent to me to purchase the Mac version.  Went through the checkout process and processed my payment.-  The payment never processed.  It just sat there.... and sat there... and sat there....  All the buttons on the page were disabled so I couldn't go back, or try again.-  I finally just gave up and ordered it directly from Microsoft.  It was more expensive, but at least I know that Microsoft is a reputable company.UPDATE:  A representative from the company reached out after seeing my review and apologized for the experience.  I appreciated the contact and have adjusted my rating based on the follow-up.

Review.Titre: Not the best but resolved the issue
Review.Contenu: I still have not been able to reactivate MS Office pro plus 2016 on my new laptop.   License shows up related to my account but when I called Microsoft they told me it was a one time use license and coultd not be reused.   Dealing with support has been ridiculous.  They had me uninstall software on my old laptop and before installing on new and still I cannot use the license.   Software support called me and initiated a desktop support session which got disconnected and they never called me back.  I now have no usable software.  Sent an email to the desktop support team with all documentation and screen shots and then send back a survey?  This all started when I purchased MS home and office 2016 from them and they couldn't deliver a license number, so instead they "upgraded" me for free and sent a MS Pro Plus license number which is useless now.   I asked for them to just send me the license number for the software I paid for and still have not received a response. And I still do not have software reinstalled to use.  Wish I had pressed them for a refund to begin with.. I have a receipt for software I was never provided a key for.  Headed to the Microsoft site to get the software I need.  Microsoft told me directly that the license I was sold is no longer valid.UPDATE SINCE MY ORIGINAL POSTING>  Software keep immediately after seeing the awful review sent me a new product key and then started calling me about every 4 hours trying to get in touch with me to ensure the software could be installed and the key was valid.Since the key was always the issue, once I had a new key the installation was no problem.
I had Mustafa today, very helpful and knowledgeable

Review.Titre: Carl was very pleasant and helped me…
Review.Contenu: Carl was very pleasant and helped me with my questions.  I understand that there are a lot of clients looking for help and staffing can be a tough situation, however, there were a few times I waited quite awhile.Having said that, I am very satisfied with the experience as a whole.

Review.Titre: As I am not adept, the assistant was very patient and helpful
Review.Contenu: Out of my own error, I downloaded a word program and used the wrong signin, so it wouldn't work.  I got online and though I had to wait a few times, Jaysen helped me through some frustrating moments, a disconnection, and my own ineptitude at systems.  He got it to work, for which I am grateful.  Never rude, always polite and patient.  I recommend the service.

Softwarekeep was great to work with. Since I had issues with two other vendors for Office products, I was leary when they upgraded my order. The support techs answered all of my questions in a timely manner. I would have given them 5 stars, but I did not like the fact that they upgraded my order before consulting with me.

I had difficulty installing software I'd purchased. Joe walked me through the steps. It took a few different routes to get it to work. In the end, it seems like it had already been installed, that it was the installation instructions that were lacking, but Joe helped me figure it all out.

Review.Titre: I ordered a standalone copy of…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a standalone copy of Microsoft Excel so I could install it for use with an ERP solution. The delivery of the product (download) was a bit slow, but maybe I was impatient. I received the product, and I installed the product without issue. I would certainly buy from this place again.

I placed an order for a copy of MS Office, but somehow I was billed for 2 copies.  Jesus helped me and arranged for a refund for one copy.  Strange thing was that I did not recieve any email regardng the first order.Anyway, Jesus was able to resolve the issue in a fair amount of time

Review.Titre: Carl was excellent via Chat, voice support not answer
Review.Contenu: Carl was excellent via Chat and resolved my issue.  It would have been 5 stars had I not called in for support initially before using chat and listened to a ring-no answer for about 3 minutes then an automated voice telling me to call back later, then a disconnect.

Review.Titre: I got it up and running!
Review.Contenu: I got it up and running! Had a download problem. Joe quickly got it resolved. Only reason I didn't rate 5 stars is because of your process. Both Joe and Jesus (I mistakenly cut him off) requested me to snip a screen, something I have never done. Too much pressure to learn it while on a chat (I'm 78). I suggested that both just go to the sites I was given in the email and see what I saw. But by the time I sent the suggestion in, Joe gave me a new location from which to download. From then on it was a piece of cake. Thanks Joe (and Jesus)!Bob

Review.Titre: Great price on MS Office from SoftwareKeep
Review.Contenu: Placed my order for MS Office 2016 on Wednesday 5:47 PM and received the product key the next day,  Thursday 7:46 AM.  The price was very competitive. There were no issues installing the software and registering it. I'm very happy with my purchase. Minus 1 star because it took a while to get the product key.

Emir was able to make a rather complicated installation for me, which I appreciated very much. Then I requested something which he had to research, and he promised to email or call me back later.  I have every confidence that he will do that, just as he said.

After purchasing, which works very well, and during the purchasing process no information is provided that says anything about the fact that within 15 minutes the key code will be sent.  One is left with the idea that one has been bamboozled out of money.  Other than that, it seems to be a 5 star deal.

Review.Titre: WAS ON WITH MUSTAFA THIS MORNING
Review.Contenu: WAS ON WITH MUSTAFA THIS MORNING. HE WAS VERY GOOD AT GETTING THE SOFTWARE INSTALLED. I AM STILL NOT SURE WHY I COULD NOT DOWNLOAD THE SOFTWARE, MS OFFICE 2010, AND USE THE GIVEN PRODUCT KEY. THERE WAS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE LINKS AND THE INSTALL. ALL'S WELL THAT ENDS WELL.

I had a helpful guy Joe I think his name who assisted me to fix my Microsoft account and setup my office home and student. His help is much appreciated. The only problem was him not admitting his real name Quir and telling me it was Joe. Im not sure though. Good Service!

Review.Titre: Turned out fabulous in the end
Review.Contenu: Joe and I got off to a rough start, but after I communicated that their mocking was offensive, they made a complete turn around and became tremendously helpful.  Joe kindly upgraded my purchase, which was totally unexpected and genuinely appreciated and it helped me learn that Joe may have a sense of humor that may not translate well in text.  I'm so grateful for Joe's support in the end and I never expected to be able to continue having Joe as a support if I have any future troubleshooting needs.  So in the end it was a great experience and I'm grateful for Joe's support.

great chat support unfortunately I could not resolve the problem.  Still can NOT get the Win10 download to work on my laptop.. just a glitch in the system.  Lenova may have just forgotten to enable the upgrade of this machine.  Who knows??I hope I can get a refund on the transaction??  or just $99 lost.

Joe was helpful, and solved the problem quickly.  I rated at 4 stars not because of Joe, but because I had a computer problem that demanded reset and your license for my product previously purchased became invalid. I had to repurchase the software.  That seems unfair.

Ping was my chat tech. My problem was solved but it took a long time for the first response and there were several times when the tech's answers were delayed by several minutes, I suspect the tech was working multiple cases at the same time.

I purchased Microsoft Office Professional Pro 2010. The price was excellent but when I put in the product key it would not accept it. The company was able to provide me with a new key and remotely installed it for me so I would not have to uninstall the program.

I purchased Microsoft's Office program and had a great problems activating with the number that was given me.  After several phone calls, one of them to Allan, my program was activated.  He was very helpful.  It was simpler in the old days.Thank you.

I was concerned about the price being so low and thought this was a scam, as the original price for the product I requested was a difference of $300. I was assured by Joe, the support team member via chat, that this was legitimate, was provided additional links to other customer reviews and answered all my questions as to the location of the business, how the discount is achieved and offered an additional discount as well. Overall, so far, very satisfied with the service, pending purchase and download of the software. Covid forced lay off and funks are tight, so being financially scammed right now would be a double-downer. Thanks Joe

Review.Titre: I purchased Microsoft Office Home and…
Review.Contenu: I purchased Microsoft Office Home and Student 2019 along with a Usb Software Backup from Softwarekeep.  I had researched the company to make sure they sold legitimate Microsoft products because the price was over a third less than purchasing it from a local store. I am not "techno savy" so I must say that the installation instructions were not as detailed as I needed (that's why I took away a star).  After 2 days and several tries, I contacted the company through the Chat Room.  Mark was very helpful and installed the software remotely for me.  I am now very pleased with my purchase.

Taking off one star for the sneakiness here.... Of course in researching Softwarekeep you might check out the reviews and see only positive ones because this is where they send you after helping you. Let's see if I have problems again after another "update", which apparently is a Microsoft update...which happens often!!! I didn't get any other explanation for why my activation key wasn't working. I'll need to reach out again to support if it happens again. But overall, the support staff was somewhat helpful. It took 3 attempts in calling them to get towards a solution. And my questions weren't entirely being answered.

I had some difficulty activating MS Publisher.Joe was quick to respond and help me out.He spend just a few minutes to get it working as it should.I think the instructions were somewhat garbled and may have caused this problem.Thank you Joe.

Review.Titre: Ordering process went without a hitch
Review.Contenu: Ordering process went without a hitch. Initial email from SK had a broken URL. Chatted with Tim and got a workable one and downloaded. Haven't installed yet but anticipate no problems.I was impressed with the prompt chat session since this was on a Sunday. Many thanks.

Review.Titre: Great customer support, awkward purchase mechanism
Review.Contenu: Joe was super helpful on chat, but I did find the purchase process a little nerve-wracking and confusing. the 15-minute window between purchase and download makes me nervous! I accidentally clicked "back" and thought I had lost my purchase.

Review.Titre: Got things working as quickly as possible
Review.Contenu: Got things working in a relatively short amount of time.  My only suggestion would be to provide more feedback when the user, me, has to wait for something.  there were a few times I was not sure what was going on or if the connection had been lost because the person helping didn't provide enough feedback Like " i'm researching and will get back to you in a couple of minutes"  or '...I'm still here just following up on a lead..." or something like that.  But over all I can't complain since s/he fixed my problem.thanks!

Review.Titre: Anne on chat got office activated
Review.Contenu: When I tried to activate the MS office I purchased on line using the activation key provided MS rejected it.  I used chat to contact SofwareKeeper and was helped by Anne. She was very patient with me and helped me get Office activated.

Review.Titre: Product didn't activated right away… Carl helped me out in a few small steps
Review.Contenu: Product didn't activated right away with Mircosoft office activation wizard. I went to my email and found a chat link at the bottom,  which I was able connect with Carl. I provided my order number and what error I was receiving which was that product key has already been activated the maximum number of times. He asked me to Open any program and then from the activation wizard, Kindly select phone activation. Take a screenshot of the Installation ID and send it here so I could activate your software. He took a few mins and gave me my confirmation ID and I went back to Activation wizard entered my ID and it successfully worked. Thanks Carl.

Just completed an exchange of a difficult product fulfillment experience. Strange because I had purchased from here several times without issue. Chatted with Jesus who completely resolved my issue and restored my confidence in using this company.

Review.Titre: The measure of any good company is what…
Review.Contenu: The measure of any good company is what they do when things go wrong. I was able to get a lot of help from Ray during some issues with the license I purchase. It turned a seemingly crappy situation into something workable and fair. Thanks Ray.

Review.Titre: Problems solved!  When my purchased Microsoft Office…
Review.Contenu: When my purchased Microsoft Office software would not load onto my computer, JD took over and made it work. While not being able to do it myself was frustrating, JD managed to fix the problems that I would never have been able to fix.

I purchased Windows 10 because I had Windows Vista and it is know longer around so I have to start all over.  I am having trouble installing windows 10 on my computer.  The people that I have talked to in the live chat were very helpful each one got me a little further setting up Windows 10 but I just cannot get the last part.  I don't know what I am doing wrong.  I might be contacting them again next weed and maybe then I will get set up.  But, so far I am completely satisfied with Softwarekeep even though I am having trouble.  Ask me again in a couple weeks then I might rate it 5 stars.

Hi there!I talked to a previous representative and it was David and Mustafa. They help me with more information though I don't know if I can fix it alone. But they help me so much! Thanks for the great customer service!Be safe everyone.

Review.Titre: Carl helped me register my software
Review.Contenu: Carl helped me register my software. I got everything installed but I couldn't register my software with the code I was given but he gave me a new code and when I had trouble with that, he managed to fix it for me. Thanks.

They upgraded my product for free, which was nice. The product came with a virus that crashed my computer entirely, causing me to have to pay for repair. Upon contacting them about the issue, they issued a refund. I appreciate their response.

Review.Titre: Excellent help, a lot of noise
Review.Contenu: Ray provided excellent help.  Sent email saying he was running late on another call but didn't say he would call when he finished on that call. That would be helpful.   Also, a lot of background noise, including a dog.

I had a good deal of trouble being able to download the correct software for my PC, and Joe not only helped me figure out what the problem even was but also took me through getting a refund and directions on where to find the right software.

I purchased MS Publisher.  It didn't download so I chatted with Jesus.  They were out of licenses for it, so they gave me Pro for the same price.  I give Jesus a 5, but the company a 4 for selling something they were out of...

Review.Titre: I received an email with an code for…

Review.Titre: Paul and I got off to a bad start
Review.Contenu: Paul and I got off to a bad start. It seemed to take a long time for questions to be answered. He finally offered to take over my computer and download and install for me. This wet much faster and much easier on my part. Thanks Paul.

I was unable to download my MS Office purchase using the link from Softwarekeep. It was a 4GB file and it wouldn't load faster than 500KBS and the download failed twice. I used the online chat and remote access for a tech to try to install the SW but the first attempt loaded for half an hour and failed at <40%. A second tech then had me load directly from Microsoft itself (I had never done this and he had to do it by remote access). That downloaded in minutes. The tech did all the clicks and MS Office loaded fine. Overall the process is excessively cumbersome and next time I'd pay for the software on a memory stick or other physical medium but the technical support was very good.

Review.Titre: Joe and I got off on the wrong foot at…
Review.Contenu: Joe and I got off on the wrong foot at first.  But he was able to assist me with the issues I was having.  Being a bit skeptical for letting someone having control over my computer I did it anyway.Thanks for the help!

Paul did a fabulous job of installing Microsoft Office on my computer. The only thing he could've improved on was explaining a little better how to get out of S mode. But I was really impressed in the end.

Review.Titre: Finally, after three days and twenty emails, I met Kay...
Review.Contenu: Finally, after three days and twenty emails, I met Kay at Softwarekeep. Kay was proactive, knowledgeable and instrumental in getting my product problem resolved in a timely manner. Wish all service-technicians were as effective and efficient as Kay!

I just ordered Publisher from Softwarekeep. There was a slight issue with getting the activation email. with a quick chat with Joe he had fixed my problem and stayed on the chat until install was complete. Thanks Joe

They made good on an error.  And for that, I give Softwarekeep a lot of credit.I had a rough start with Softwarekeep, as my order (Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac) was not initially fulfilled.  After placing my order, I learned that they were out of stock.  I was frustrated that they would "confirm" my order and charge my credit card if they were not able to fulfill the order.After a couple rounds of discussing options with their support staff, I was eventually contacted by a supervisor (yes, HE called ME back), who was able to fulfill my order.Thanks, Softwarekeep, for working hard to make a (frustrated) customer satisfied!

Review.Titre: Microsoft did not accept my key code.
Review.Contenu: I was getting an error message from Microsoft saying the code key had already been used, and therefore I couldn't download the software.  Joe, the customer service agent, was able to obtain a new key code for me.

Review.Contenu: Purchase went smoothly but then I received an email that they were out of stock so I received an upgrade. I reached out to Joe who helped get that to me since I did not receive it via email. good customer service.

Review.Titre: I engaged SoftwareKeep via the chat…
Review.Contenu: I engaged SoftwareKeep via the chat option as I needed some info and question answered related to two products they sell.  Joe answered all my questions and provided me a promo code to save some money.   Great service.

Review.Titre: Mixed results with Office 2019, lots of support needed (and delivered)
Review.Contenu: This product has been problematic from the start.  It took 4 tries to get the installation right.  Then, a month later, something went wrong with the updater.  That was today's issue.  Luckily today I got Jesus who just happened to be the one that fixed the installation.  Today he also fixed the problem, by reinstalling it yet again.  In both cases he was able to explain what had happened and what he did to fix it.  Bottom line: Software Keep provides good support although some techs are not as skilled as others but I'd not purchase Office 2019 Home & Student again.  I'm on pins and needles waiting for the next problem to crop up.  It may be related to my Visio2007 that is also installed...time will tell.

Bought product and received dead links in email. Initially had trouble contacting support, but managed to live chat with Joe and he gave me a good link and resolved all my issues getting product installed. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Slight hitch activating product, but good support from Joe.
Review.Contenu: Bought a product (MS Office 2016) from UK site, only to find I couldn't activate because I was in wrong region (I am in UK). Live chat with JOE resolved the issue very quickly, so I would rate their tech support (Joe, at least!).

It took about 3 hours, but the Job got done.   I had to allow remote access to my computer which I did not want to do, but that seemed to be the only way.  Qlint hung in there and got it set up.  Thanks

I purchase windows 10 In this company. Since im not a computer literate, I had trouble in installing the software. I tried watching video in youtube but none of them really helps me. Then i decided to call their support team. I explain what i did and my incapability when in comes to technology. They tolerated my incompetence and explain all the details in english not in the tech word. They walk me through the process they also let me take notes what steps i should take and important details i need to keep in my mind. Now im writing this review in my windows 10 that i bough to them. They are really professional. I would recommend this to all of my friends.

Review.Titre: Downloading and implementing the new version of Microsoft Word: Daniel was extremely helpful!
Review.Contenu: Daniel was extremely helpful and patient. He was willing to go the extra mile(s), take the time and help me get access to what I needed, so that I could do the work that is required of me to do. It seemed he may have had too many calls at once - during this time the process was slow, and communication was unclear. We did not have a great connection, but he was persistent, and an amazing help!  THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH DANIEL - BUT There is a definite problem in getting access to documents that are not word (for example, like apple docs). There must be a way to make that an easier process, especially if the package is made for Macs! Daniel spent a lot of time assisting me with this issue as well, as my most recent resume(s) were not word documents. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Arnie was very professional even though…
Review.Contenu: Arnie was very professional even though I had to purchase another license key when he was unable to repair the one that I was issued in Jan 2018.  The company offers great prices compared to off the shelf items from Microsoft.

Great customer service !Haven't had a chance to install yet.. but I did not get the email to download software in the 15 minute window they say.  I opened the chat and Mustafa took care of it instantly !

Review.Titre: One of the great customer support
Review.Contenu: One of the great customer support service provided by Softwarekeep. Resolves all the queries quick and fast. Doing their work professionally. They also provide some amazing offers and discounts.
Joes was great. He helped me place an order successfully when I encountered an error. He stayed with me through the process and waited until  I received an confirmation email. Thank you Joe!

Review.Titre: Week-old local Office version installation suddenly required login
Review.Contenu: I was pleased to get through to a real person (Joe) almost right away.  That level of support is rare nowadays.  My problem was my 1 week old installation of Office 2019 suddenly required security information.  I didn't think that should happen since it is not an online version of Office.  We got Joe set up to see and control my screen and he fixed everything.  It was so fast, I have no idea what he did.  When asked why this happened, he said it was due to an Office 2019 update.  I haven't a clue when, why, or how such an update occurred so for now I've just taken his word for it that the problem is fixed permanently.  (Joe, if you read this...you said you would be my support person for future problems, but I forgot to ask how to contact you.)
I got my software and my only complaint was that it did not work to activate online and needed to be activated by telephone. However, Ping was very helpful and got it activated promptly.

Review.Titre: Loved the fact that I could buy…
Review.Contenu: Loved the fact that I could buy legitimate, licensed (older) MS software, e.g. Office 2013. (I ended up upgrading to 2019, but I could have replaced my original 2013 software with a new legal copy.)  I found some websites that were more expensive and others less expensive. When I purchased, the web page said "working hard to deliver in < 30 minutes".  It actually took ~10 hours. When I tried precisely use the download/activation instructions provided via email, they didn't work. So I had to reach out to the world-class support department. Joe did a good job. He worked with me for 2 hours to get operational.  I like the notion that Joe will be my "personal tech" for future issues. Joe was anxious to resolve issues quickly, and was persistent until we finally got it working.

Review.Titre: Helpful support from Joe but better protocol for ending remote sessions is needed
Review.Contenu: I received very helpful support from the online technicians Daniel and Joe.  They were able to quickly address all my issues, and I gave remote access to Joe, who was able to help me download the software and get access to it.  My only discomfort came at the end, as I received no official confirmation that the remote session had ended.  I was unnerving to think of someone having access to everything on my computer.  I don't know why the "Join" software used in the remote session doesn't have a function where it states "Joe has left the session and no longer has access to your computer."  But that is a big problem.  Please consider coming up with a solution to put customers' minds at ease regarding this issue.  Otherwise, I'm very happy with the support I received.

Review.Titre: Again coming through as the best assist…
Review.Contenu: Again coming through as the best assist around, Joe with software1985 is amazing, making it easy to access your laptop remotely and download what's needed.   A great group to work with, I highly recommend SoftwareKeep.

Paul was able to resolve a significant activation issue with the Microsoft software on my Mac laptop.  He was knowledgeable, courteous, professional, and patient with my numerous questions.  Thank You!

Good price for the product. There were a few technical issues however the chat site was very helpful. Joe assisted and promptly corrected the issue. He was very helpful and efficient.{quite unlike the typical chat at other sites}. I am very pleased. Richard O
Joe resolved my issue. After fighting a reinstall for 2 days Joe fixed it in 5 minutes. Thank you.
The car is evil. He vgrooy. I've only had a car like this. and according to fourth version the really stepped there game up now it's by the thousands in a week or so.

I just accepted the install, and it installed the correct software version.That is a small error from Microsft, not from Softwarekeek. I've had the same confusing message when I've installed other MS products.

Daniel patiently guided me through a long process to correct a problem with a new MS Office license. It required re-downloading the app and several steps to activate the license again. Throughout the two hour session, he remained professional and most helpful. He exemplifies the kind of service we all wish we could get.  He deserves all five stars!

Review.Titre: I have had a couple of problems

The best customer service I have ever experienced online.  I screwed some things up and Anne, Emir and especially Eric patiently helped me resolve the errors I had made.  Can't say enough in favor of customer support.  Prices of software were great, too.

Review.Titre: Joe did a good job clearing up my confusion.

Review.Titre: I purchased Microsoft Windows 10 and…Office Home and Student 2019

Joe was able to understand what I wanted and advised me of the products that would best suit my needs. Always feels comfortable when you are dealing with a knowledgeable person without having to explain much

Review.Titre: A company that cares about people!

Joe was a great technician. I got a response to my initial message right away. He asked good questions and gave quick, clear answers. I am awaiting resolution of the issue (a refund) within the 24-72 hours stated. Thank you, Joe!

Softwarekeep has older versions of ms office at affordable prices. Their tech support team got back to me within minutes of my request. Eric resolved my issue during our chat session. This is a great company!

Review.Titre: I bought Microsoft Office to replace an…old version that stopped working

The Softwarekeep price for Microsoft Office was amazing and I also got a discount.  But after downloading, the new version didn't work either.  The team put me in touch with a tech named Paul online.  I told him the issue and he was off and running.  After trying a million things, he found the problem...a bug...embedded in my computer three years ago by a free antivirus program that was supposed to protect me from such things.  Bravo Paul!  You and your Softwarekeep team are awesome!  I am a very happy customer!

Review.Titre: A fantastic technician from Turkey who…
